short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects your attention from social media to the places that matter the most.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing RedirectSocial - the ultimate chrome extension that helps you take back control of your time and attention. Say goodbye to mindless scrolling on social media and hello to increased productivity and focus on your deep work.

With RedirectSocial, you can block access to the sites that distract you the most and redirect yourself to the ones that matter. Our seamless integration with your browser makes it easy to customize your list of blocked sites and redirect destinations.

Whether you're a student, professional, or just someone who wants to be more productive, RedirectSocial is the perfect solution for you. Our user-friendly interface and powerful features make it easy to stay on track and achieve your goals.

Stop wasting your time and start redirecting your focus with RedirectSocial. Download our chrome extension today and take the first step towards a more productive and fulfilling life.

Go to https://redirectsocial.com to subscribe for updates and sign up today.
